prompts.flatlay:
PROFESSIONAL STUDIO E-COMMERCE FLAT LAY.

Take the EXACT black swimwear from the input images and photograph in a professional studio setting.

COPY the product EXACTLY - same fabric, same color, same minimal coverage style with thin side straps and high-cut leg openings.

PLACE laid PERFECTLY FLAT on a clean studio surface:
- Fabric completely smooth, pressed flat
- Thin side straps spread symmetrically
- Two black eyelets visible on lower left
- Top-down studio camera angle
- Match composition from reference photo (last image)

STUDIO QUALITY: High-end e-commerce catalog photography. Crisp, clean, polished.

LIGHTING: Soft, even studio lighting. Minimal shadows.

BACKGROUND: Clean light gray seamless studio backdrop.

prompts.belt:
COPY EXACT COMPOSITION from reference (image 1). Professional e-commerce waistband detail shot.

COMPOSITION - MATCH REFERENCE EXACTLY:
- Low angle, almost parallel to surface
- Waistband runs diagonally across frame
- CRITICAL: Waistband must be RULER-STRAIGHT, PERFECTLY HORIZONTAL - absolutely NO curve, NO arc, NO sagging, NO dipping. The top edge must be a mathematically straight line from left to right

PRODUCT: Black minimal swim briefs with elastic waistband.
- Black swimwear fabric - match EXACTLY from input
- Smooth elastic waistband
- NO drawstrings on this style

STUDIO QUALITY: Fabric PERFECTLY FLAT, smooth, crisp. NO wrinkles, NO bunching.

Light gray background. Bright, even studio lighting.

prompts.front:
E-commerce on-model photo. Copy the pose and composition from the LAST reference image.

IMAGE ORDER:
- Image 1: Model headshot - use this EXACT model ({{modelDesc}})
- Images 2+: Product photos of the {{productColor}} {{shortProductName}}
- LAST image: Pose/composition reference

MODEL: Use the EXACT model from image 1. Same face, same skin tone, same build. Athletic male, SHIRTLESS.

OUTFIT - MUST MATCH EXACTLY:
- SWIMWEAR: {{productColor}} {{shortProductName}} from the product images. Minimal coverage style with thin side straps, high-cut leg openings, V-front design. Black RON DORFF eyelets MUST be clearly visible. Fabric smooth and fitted.

FRAMING: WAIST UP, FRONT FACING - body facing STRAIGHT toward camera. Show from waist/hips upward. Model's face, torso, and chest visible. Swimwear visible at bottom of frame with eyelets shown. NO legs/feet.

LIGHTING & BACKGROUND: SOFT, EVEN, DIFFUSED studio lighting. No harsh shadows or highlights on skin or fabric. Gentle, flattering light. Light gray backdrop.
